## Container.transformStore() method

Runs the entire repository through the supplied fn and returns the transformed value.

Signature:

```typescript
transformStore(transformFn: (value: any) => any): any;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                   | Description |
| ----------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| transformFn | (value: any) =&gt; any |             |

Returns:

any

The transformed repository

## Example

```js
container.transform((store) => modifiedStore);
```
